original_title: Heaven shall burn - Wacken open air
overview: Voice of the Voiceless.  Land of the Upright Ones.  Forlorn Skies.  Corium.  Combat.  Passage of the Crane.  Downshifter.  The Omen.  Hunters Will Be Hunted.  Counterweight.  Awoken.  Endzeit.  Godiva.  Black tears.
title: Heaven shall burn - Wacken open air
